name: smartcoin

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix sc_server" "npm run dev --prefix sc_client"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix sc_server && npm install --prefix sc_client && npm run build --prefix sc_client && npm run build --prefix sc_server

description: **Smartcoin** is my first full-stack application built with: - React + TypeScript + Vite, - Express,  - MongoDB, - NodeJs, - Tailwindcss (CSS), - Figma ( Designs )
